name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope themed robot with a retro console attached to its back. Its body resembles a sleek cat with box-shaped features. The arms and legs are designed to resemble those of a cat, giving it a playful and agile appearance. The screen on its front displays a vibrant red and black color scheme, adding to its retro aesthetic. To complete its look, Pixel is equipped with stylish shades, enhancing its cool and trendy vibe.
